verses.name: Mark 14:4
verses.text: And there were some that had indignation within themselves, and said, Why was this waste of the ointment made?

verses.name: Mark 14:5
verses.text: For it might have been sold for more than three hundred pence, and have been given to the poor. And they murmured against her.

verses.name: Mark 14:6
verses.text: And Jesus said, Let her alone; why trouble ye her? she hath wrought a good work on me.

verses.name: Mark 14:7
verses.text: For ye have the poor with you always, and whensoever ye will ye may do them good: but me ye have not always.
